definition: to come back out of retirement/to get involved again after having withdrawn
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to repeat/to double/to overlap/complex (not simple)/compound/composite/double/diplo-/duplicate/overlapping/to duplicate
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

sentences.english: He was scheduled to begin a series of 1550 comeback concerts in London.
sentences.chinese: 原计划他在伦敦会进行50场的复出演唱会。

sentences.english: Because previous round the yellow card stops play, the Li Yi epicycle lifts a ban resurfaces .
sentences.chinese: 上轮因黄牌停赛，李毅本轮可谓解禁复出。

sentences.english: If Battier health back, no doubt the sky is the limit of this rocket.
sentences.chinese: 如果巴蒂尔健康复出，无疑天空才是这支火箭的极限。

sentences.english: Rafael Benitez has today been boosted by the return to fitness of defender Daniel Agger.
sentences.chinese: 贝尼特斯今天表示，阿格将在近日正式复出。

sentences.english: David Nalbandian is ready come back from injury.
sentences.chinese: 波特罗势头正与日俱增，纳尔班迪安准备复出。

sentences.english: Jo In Sung has been selected as the "most anticipated comeback after veteran actor first."
sentences.chinese: 赵寅成曾被选为“退伍后最期待复出的演员第一名”。

sentences.english: Ferguson, meanwhile, revealed he was taking a long-term view when he opted for Nemanja Vidic of his returning centre-backs.
sentences.chinese: 福格森爵士说他选择复出的维蒂奇是一个长期的考虑。

sentences.english: All being well he should be available for the Carling Cup or the game before.
sentences.chinese: 他应该可以在联赛杯前正式复出。

sentences.english: Kevin-Prince Boateng is back in action for AC Milan after more than two months out with injury.
sentences.chinese: 在两个多月的因伤缺席后，博阿滕终于复出。

sentences.english: Koscielny is back from suspension and he will be involved.
sentences.chinese: 科斯切尔尼结束禁赛复出，他将会参加比赛。

sentences.english: Sadr's political comeback was the result of careful and deliberate planning.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克的政治复出是经过小心谨慎规划的结果。

sentences.english: The manager is also keen to have the option of Eboué for midfield duties.
sentences.chinese: 这位主帅还渴望埃布埃能够复出为中场提供选择。

sentences.english: This service, Xisuoke lifts a ban resurfaces , but he has received a yellow card once more.
sentences.chinese: 此役，西索科解禁复出，但他再次领到了一张黄牌。

sentences.english: After three month's treatment, the sportsman finally recovered and can reappear.
sentences.chinese: 经过三个月的治疗，这个运动员终于伤愈复出了。
